Class Robots

  • java.lang.Object
    • Robots

  • public class Robots
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages all interactions with the robots.txt file

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> disallowed
      The list of URLs which are disallowed for robots

      Returns all disallowed URLs
      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAllDisallowedUrls(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> lines)
      Processes the lines of a robots.txt file and returns all the URLs that are disallowed for this crawler.
      boolean isAllowed(java.lang.String url)

      • loadRobotsTxt

        public void loadRobotsTxt(java.lang.String baseUrl)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Loads all the entries from a site's robots.txt
        Parameters:
        baseUrl - The base URL to fetch robots.txt from
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getAllDisallowedUrls

        private java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAllDisallowedUrls(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> lines)
        Processes the lines of a robots.txt file and returns all the URLs that are disallowed for this crawler. This is a naive implementation of a robots.txt parser and does not take into account Allow: lines.
        Parameters:
        lines - The lines of the robots.txt
        Returns:
        A list of disallowed URLs

      • isAllowed

        public boolean isAllowed(java.lang.String url)
        Determines if the URL is allowed to be crawled by robots based on the site's robots.txt
        Parameters:
        url - The URL to check
        Returns:
        true if robots are allowed, otherwise false

      • isDisallowed

        public boolean isDisallowed(java.lang.String url)
        Determines if the URL is not allowed to be crawled by robots based on the site's robots.txt
        Parameters:
        url - The URL to check
        Returns:
        true if robots are disallowed, otherwise false

      • getAllDisallowedUrls

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAllDisallowedUrls()
        Returns all disallowed URLs
        Returns:
        All disallowed URLs
